mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_MFA_TOTP (USER_ID, SECRET_ENC, ENABLED, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (#{userId}, #{secretEnc}, #{enabled}, NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE SECRET_ENC = CASE WHEN ENABLED = 0 THEN VALUES(SECRET_ENC) ELSE SECRET_ENC END, ENABLED = GREATEST(ENABLED, VALUES(ENABLED)), UPDATED_AT = NOW()
